Posts.Content: KeepingFaith69 wrote: Well I received great and terrible news today. The great news is that my life insurance payout has been approved. To meet the criteria, the oncs had to confirm that I COULD die within 12 months. That's the stink news! I am choosing to focus in the COULD, it is my intent that I will be one of those 'miracles' that people write about. In saying that, I am feeling rather ick and aware of my mortality. I know that HER2 is aggressive and I am hoping that X and T cocktail will keep me above water for a loooong long time. As such, Im looking for hope. Any ladies with the same onc type and liver mets who have outlived 12 months? Pae xo. I surrender to God and the Angels and I choose PEACE. Dx 8/16/2010, <1cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/13 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Dx 12/31/2012, Stage IV, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: ER- PR- HER2+ with liver mets outlived 12 months? KeepingFaith69 KeepingFaith69

Posts.Content: KeepingFaith69 wrote: I've been managing Ok with regards to scans. They've been delayed abd delayed, so I happily continued in my world of oblivion. Has scan 4 hours ago, and I've been crying since. So scared and afraid :( Wishing you all well x Pae xo. I surrender to God and the Angels and I choose PEACE. Dx 8/16/2010, <1cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/13 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Dx 12/31/2012, Stage IV, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scan Day today KeepingFaith69 Jill49

Posts.Content: KeepingFaith69 wrote: Hi I have just started cycle 2 of xeloda/tykerb. Today I received an appointment date and time for my next mo meeting. It had been scheduled for an hour instead of the normal 30 minute session. I can't help but worry that he is going to cancel or change things, or tell me my expiry date. The schedulers have told me its a 'continuance' and don't have any additional information. Why would they have a longer session? It's too soon for scans. Next appointment is 11th Feb, I fear in going to drive myself and my family batty with anxiety. Help, please. Pae xo. I surrender to God and the Angels and I choose PEACE. Dx 8/16/2010, <1cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/13 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Dx 12/31/2012, Stage IV, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
